personal.name: Ian Iglipa
personal.title: Full-Stack Developer & Game Creator
personal.bio: Passionate developer with 3+ years of experience across web development, mobile apps, and roblox game creation. I specialize in building scalable applications and immersive gaming experiences that blend creativity.

specialties.title: Web Development
specialties.description: Crafting responsive web applications with modern technologies including React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.

specialties.title: Android Development
specialties.description: Building native Android applications with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose for modern, performant mobile experiences.

specialties.title: Game Development
specialties.description: Creating engaging Roblox games with Lua scripting, focusing on immersive gameplay and user interaction.

achievements.title: Discord Bot Developer Certification
achievements.description: Certified for creating advanced Discord bots with over 50,000 active users

achievements.title: Google Play Developer Award
achievements.description: Featured app with 100K+ downloads and 4.8-star rating

achievements.title: Roblox Developer Contest Winner
achievements.description: 1st place in Roblox Game Jam 2022 for innovative gameplay mechanics

achievements.title: React.js Expert Certification
achievements.description: Advanced certification in React.js development and best practices

experience.description: Lead developer for React.js and Node.js applications serving 100K+ users. Built scalable microservices architecture and mentored junior developers.
Developed native Android applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. Published 3 apps with combined 200K+ downloads.
Created multiplayer Roblox games with custom scripting and monetization systems.

projects.title: VALCORE Discord Bot
projects.description: A Discord backup and assistant bot that uses Open Authorization 2.0 to safely move members to a backup server during critical outages. Used across 850+ servers.

projects.title: U.N.I
projects.description: A tense Roblox survival experience set in a post-apocalyptic version of NU Laguna.

projects.title: Coinvert
projects.description: A prototype android app that turns your loose change into digital coins!
